title: The Health connection
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Ferryman Productions and New South Wales Film Corporation
brief_description: Looks at the operation of the NSW sewage system, in particular around the Sydney area. Shows the maintenance of the existing operation as well as the planning and construction of additional services to meet the increasing demands newly-settled areas. Stresses the quality control that is implemented to ensure that pollution levels remain below those that could endanger the health of the community.
